text: Hak phwk cea ptiseth sraththa dangnan thæ cring xallxhˌ nan thrng phx pheiyng cak phwk cea læa ca mi thrng piti yindi tx kar nerkhun khxng pwng baw khxng phraxngkh læa hak phwk cea ktayyu phraxngkh k ca thrng piti yindi tx phwk cea læa mimi phu bæk phara khn dı thi ca bæk phara khxng phu xun di læw yang phracea khxng phwk cea khux kark lab khxng phwk cea læa phraxngkh k ca thrng bxk lea phwk cea nı sing thi phwk cea di kratha wi thæcring phraxngkh nan pen phuthrng rxbru sing thi xyu nı thrwngxk
